org.archive.util

类 UriUtilsTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • org.archive.util.UriUtilsTest
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class UriUtilsTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase
    JUnit test suite for UriUtils. Several of the tests for the 'legacy' (H1 through at least 1.14.4) heuristics are disabled by renaming, because those heuristics have known failures; however, until more experience with the new heuristics is collected, H1 still uses them for consistency.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明

      static void main(java.lang.String[] argv)
      run all the tests for ArchiveUtilsTest
      static junit.framework.Test suite() 
      void testAbsolutes()
      check that absolute URIs return true with new tests
      void testLegacyAbsolutes()
      check that absolute URIs return true with legacy tests
      void testLegacyNaiveNotUris()
      check that strings that fail naive test are not deemed URIs legacy tests
      void testLegacySimpleImagePathAbsolutes()
      check that path-absolute image URIs return true with legacy tests
      void testNaiveFalsePositives()
      check that typical false-positives of the naive test are not deemed URIs
      void testNaiveNotUris()
      check that strings that fail naive test are not deemed URIs new tests
      void testNewSimpleImageRelatives()
      check that plausible relative image URIs return true with new tests
      void testSimpleImagePathAbsolutes()
      check that path-absolute image URIs return true with new tests
      protected void tryAll(java.lang.String[] candidates, boolean expected)
      Test that all supplied candidates give the expected results, for the 'new' heuristics now in this class.
      void xestLegacyNaiveFalsePositives()
      check that typical false-positives of the naive test are not deemed URIs
      void xestLegacySimpleImageRelatives()
      check that plausible relative image URIs return true with legacy tests
